Returns the length of the content in bytes

Returns:
Throws:

setSize

boolean setSize(long size)
                throws ManagedIOException
Allow for establishing a start buffer size for the file contents. This method is optional. Classes that do no support it must fail silently and return false.

Parameters:
size -
Returns:
true if the size was changed, false otherwise;
Throws:
ManagedIOException
